summary: Jacob Fatu is a Samoan-American professional wrestler, currently signed with Major League Wrestling (MLW) where he is a former MLW World Heavyweight Champion. As a member of the renowned Anoa'i wrestling family, Fatu carries a strong wrestling pedigree. He's known for his aggressive, high-impact style, combining brawling and high-flying maneuvers. Fatu began his career on the independent circuit, honing his skills before gaining national attention. His MLW tenure has been marked by dominant performances and a captivating presence. Beyond MLW, he has also competed in other promotions, solidifying his reputation as a formidable force in professional wrestling. His matches are known for their intensity and unpredictable nature, drawing fans in with his powerful presence and athleticism.

quiz.question: Which wrestling promotion is Jacob Fatu most associated with currently?
